ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bizarre item on a merchant
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh!  The way I got my Gleaming Broadsword (or whatever it is) was by a guildbro seeing it for sale on an FV merchant.  450pp later it was mine (drops off a
ygData.messageBody:
Heh! The way I got my Gleaming Broadsword (or whatever it is) was by a
guildbro seeing it for sale on an FV merchant. 450pp later it was mine
(drops off a level 50-ish MOB in Trak). Those kind of things are rare, but
such a joy when you get lucky enough to stumble on them. Grats :o)

-=B=-
The Rathe

> >Had a really weird thing happen the other night. I was running thru
Qeynos
> >looking for tailoring supplies and checking all the vendors. I found a
HQ
> >bear pelt which made me happy, but the merchant also had Mistmoore Drums
and
> >a Blessed Ring of Nife. The Drums were way out of my price range, but I
> >couldn't imagine why anyone would sell them to a merchant even if they
were
> >quitting their bard. The Ring of Nife is also very useful and was only
2pp
> >or so. I can't wait to see the look on our cleric's face the next time
he
> >is OOM and we desperately need a Greater Heal.
